metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3530 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
A flaw was discovered in GNU libiberty within demangle_path() inrust-demangle.c, as distributed in GNU Binutils version 2.36. A craftedsymbol can cause stack memory to be exhausted leading to a crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3530` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-arc-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-common - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-for-build - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-for-host - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-multiarch - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-source - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu6
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.40-2ubuntu6
libbinutils - 2.40-2ubuntu6
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.40-2ubuntu6
libctf0 - 2.40-2ubuntu6
libgprofng0 - 2.40-2ubuntu6
No subscription required

gdb - 13.2-1ubuntu1
gdb-multiarch - 13.2-1ubuntu1
gdb-source - 13.2-1ubuntu1
gdbserver - 13.2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.40-2ubuntu6').
gdb package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '13.2-1ubuntu1').
